author: Jayson Heaton
comment: I like this and I even got the pro version. However, it won't seem to let me switch between pictures once I had one set. I restarted both my watch and my phone, but still I see no option or ability to change pictures. Even adding new ones won't help. Once this is resolved, I'll give 5 stars. I have a Wear24 watch. Edit: I figured out how to change pictures from the watch. Still difficult, it's best to just keep my favorite picture in the middle slot. Now going with 4 stars. I'll rate it 5 IF it was super simple to switch pictures from the phone by tapping and choosing "apply" like with the Samsung Gear S3.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thanks for the review. As you figured out, tap your watch once to select a photo and tap twice to return to collage view.

author: Vivek Vats
comment: Fails picture sync most of the time. Automatically refreshes the watch face to bring back one of its default images. Not worth spending money! Disappointed!

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Please try restarting your watch. If that doesn't work, kindly email us at support@sparkistic.com so we can help.

author: Rafael Velasquez II
comment: This watchface awesome.....however, I do wish that it has a screen on duration time. Usually run my watch; tilt to wake off, always on off, so when I tap to wake, I want it to stay awake for 15-20 seconds at least.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Good suggestion. Thanks for the feedback!

author: Ali S
comment: like the look of the app. unable to sync pictures to my huawei watch 2 sport. Advise for 5*

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hi Ali, please try restarting your watch and your phone. If that doesn't work, email us at support@sparkistic.com so we can help.

author: wallace jordan
comment: Works awesome on my Fossil watch, not so much on my Moto. I love that it allows me to see my phone battery level on my watch I've been looking for that functionality forever.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Great to hear! Let us know if you'd like help with the Moto: support@sparkistic.com.

author: Max The Dingus
comment: okay I thought the app was good but I only have one problem with it doesn't give you that freedom that you want you can't really do anything you only have to choose certain pictures you want and the whole frame it doesn't really like say you can choose one picture that you want and no it doesn't do that that's the problem I have with it

author: Julie Davis
comment: Like it, but don't like that half the time it makes me open the app on my phone to change the picture. I wish it was a little more user friendly on my watch itself. Otherwise, it's a great way to customize multiple pictures faces for your watch. I have an LG & pictures look great!

author: Germán Boscatto
comment: I love this App! The creator of this App doesn't force you to buy the full version of it, which I will gladly do.

author: steve chase
comment: App works on Hauwei mate 8 but not sending any pics to Hauwei watch. When I select photowear on watch it says open app on to change settings...erm hello! its,already open.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hi Steve, we're sad to hear it's not syncing your photos. Please try restarting your phone and your watch. If that still doesn't work, email us at support@sparkistic.com so we can help.

author: Blanca Garcia
comment: I love just not sure how to add step count on watch face ? I bought the pro app.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hi Blanca, we posted a video on our Google+ page that shows how to get step count on your watch: https://plus.google.com/112583485792984283798/posts/H5bMHyVwXXc. Let us know if that doesn't work: support@sparkistic.com

author: sushil kumar
comment: Limited pictures, it would be great if the number of pictures increase.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thanks for the review. We have multiple albums in our future feature list.

comment: Will not sync photos. I have tried about 20 times and it just shows the default ones. Pretty useless

comment: It is hard to use not worth the time or money only works sometimes.

author: ROBiN UMANA
comment: really good apps easy to use fast to install

author: Kash Patil
comment: Just started using this app.. Gud one to have for watch faces.. I would give 5*, if synching from fine doesn't say failed every time..

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hi Kash, please try restarting both your phone and your watch. If that still doesn't work, email us at support@sparkistic.com so we can help.

comment: This works great on my polar m600

author: Mark Fauzi
comment: I gave this app a try for a couple of hours, and went premium. This app makes my Sony Smart Watch 3 looks more elegant.

comment: Purchased the "pro", never would sync to device.

author: ChezJM D
comment: Love it once figured out simple tap on watch face opened the collage so differnt photos can be selected

author: Al Monte
comment: No Gear S2 or S3 supported...
Excellent app, I pick the background and whatever features I wants such as steps, different time zones etc

author: Lasonya Collins
comment: Don't like the collage.  Need single photo face

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: To get a single photo, simply tap on the photo on your watch. Tap twice to return to the collage view to select a new photo.

author: Patrick Sarino
comment: Amazing app! Just what I wanted! It's so perfect and works exactly as I'd imagined!

I like to have my pictures on my watch i love seing my family everyminute easy to use
Does what you would expect it to do

author: Angela Hamilton
comment: It works well

author: Stephenie Marshall
comment: Easy to use and I get the exact background that I want!  I love it!

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Yay! So happy to hear this! :)

author: Zoya Jouravski
comment: Great app to use your photos as watch face.

comment: Awesome app

comment: Nice

comment: best

author: dian kurnia
comment: Love it

author: Charles Childs
comment: Excellent watch face for using your own pictures. I thought it was perfect before, but now they've added complication support! 5 stars for sure. Please consider adding the settings configuration to the watch itself. Depending on the photo sometimes I want a different placement of the time, and as it is currently I have to change that on my phone. Could also allow for saving a specific display setting for each photo ahead of time. A small gripe but still my daily driver!

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thanks Charles...all great ideas! We're continually adding new features, so it's helpful to know what people are interested in most.

author: Ashley Pelletier
comment: Like the app just don't like how easy it is to change the setting any slight touch and the settings change. Would be great if you could lock the settings.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hi Ashley, we're working on an option for locking the watch face to help mitigate the issue you describe. If you would like to participate in the beta testing please contact us at support@sparkistic.com

comment: Bought the pro version it bought it twice a d won't even sync to watch and still gives me the option to buy it not impressed at all
